thread.title: How Twitter reacted to Lewis Hamilton's F1 drivers' title triumph
thread.title_full: How Twitter reacted to Lewis Hamilton's F1 drivers' title triumph

title: How Twitter reacted to Lewis Hamilton's F1 drivers' title triumph
text:
How Twitter reacted to Lewis Hamilton's F1 drivers' title triumph 25 Oct 2015 21:46:56 
Lewis Hamilton claimed his third Formula One drivers' championship after winning the United States Grand Prix in Austin, Texas and he was not short of plaudits on social media. 
Here is how Twitter reacted to his second consecutive title victory. 
"Well played @LewisHamilton. Champion of the world for the 3rd time. Let's try and be proud of our sporting heroes. Bloody marvellous." - Match of the Day presenter Gary Lineker (@GaryLineker) 
"Huge congrats @LewisHamilton. Head and shoulders above every other driver this season, a genuine English sporting icon. #TripleChampion" - BT Sport presenter Jake Humphrey (@mrjakehumphrey) 
"Get in there @LewisHamilton" - Sky Sports presenter Simon Thomas (@SimonThomasSky) 
"1st place has its privileges. Congrats to my brother @lewishamilton #fastandfurious #f1 #sundayfunday" - American Hip-Hop artist Ludacris (@Ludacris) 
"Congrats to @LewisHamilton !! @F1 #WorldChampion #Formel1" - Glatasaray striker Lukas Podolski (Podolski10) 
"Congrats @LewisHamilton! 3x World Champion - the last 2 with Mercedes and not McLaren! Who would have guessed? Amazing feat Lewis. #F1" - NASCAR driver Bill Lester (@Bill_Lester) 
"VROOM! Arsenal fan becomes World Champion for 3rd time. Congrats @LewisHamilton" - Piers Morgan (@piersmorgan) 
"Well done Lewis Hamilton. World champion again while we are moving at 0mph on the M1! #lewishamilton" - BBC Sport presenter Dan Walker (@mrdanwalker) 
"Congratulations to the 2015 World Champion .@LewisHamilton! #USGP" - Ferrari's F1 feed (@ScuderiaFerrari) 
"Congrats to @LewisHamilton on wining his 3rd world tittle.!!! #legend" - Seven-time World Superbike champion Carl Fogarty Related Sport News
